moduleMetadataJson.name: ARP Spoof
moduleMetadataJson.description: Spoof ARP replies and poison remote ARP caches to conduct IP address spoofing or a denial of service.
author: amaloteaux <alex_maloteaux@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: The number of seconds to wait for new data during host detection

options.name: BIDIRECTIONAL
options.description: Spoof also the source with the dest

options.name: AUTO_ADD
options.description: Auto add new host when discovered by the listener

options.name: LISTENER
options.description: Use an additional thread that will listen for arp requests to reply as fast as possible

options.name: LOCALSMAC
options.description: The MAC address of the local interface to use for hosts detection, this is usefull only if you want to spoof to another host with SMAC

options.name: LOCALSIP
options.description: The IP address of the local interface to use for hosts detection

options.name: PKT_DELAY
options.description: The delay in milliseconds between each packet during poisoning

options.name: BROADCAST
options.description: If set, the module will send replies on the broadcast address witout consideration of DHOSTS
